goal.ch: 腐蝕是電化學反應的自然過程。在本課程中將透過介紹腐蝕的基本原理，電極電位和電化學熱力學理論講述腐蝕科學與防蝕工程。比較活性金屬和鈍化金屬的腐蝕性質。利用電化學熱力學觀點實現防腐蝕。利用電化學動力學估計腐蝕速率。討論 direct current methods 與 alternative current methods。
goal.en: Corrosion is a natural process due to electrochemical reactions. Science (principles of corrosion) and the engineering (prevention of corrosion) will be detailed in this course by introduction with basic principles of corrosion and the theory of the electrode potential and electrochemical thermodynamics. Active metals which ar inclined to corrosion and passive metals that are inert to corrosion will be compared. Corrosion prevention can be achieved on the viewpoint of electrochemical thermodynamics. Corrosion rate is estimated from electrochemical kinetics. Direct current methods (such as electrochemical polarization) and alternative current methods (like impedance spectroscopy) are discussed.

outline.ch:
課程內容:
1. The technology and elvaluation of corrosion
2. Electrochemical thermodynamics and electrode potential
3. Electrochemical kinetics of Corrosion
4. Passivity
5. Polarization methods to measure corrosion rate
6. Galvanic and concentration cell corrosion
7. Pitting and crevice corrosion
8. Environmentally induced cracking
9. Effects of metallurgical structure on corrosion
10. Corrosion-related damage by hydrogen, erosion and wear
11. Corrosion in selected corrosive environments
12. Atmospheric corrosion and elevated temperature corrosion
13. Cathodic protection
14. Coating and inhibitors
15. Materials selection and design
outline.en:
Course Content:
1. The technology and elvaluation of corrosion
2. Electrochemical thermodynamics and electrode potential
3. Electrochemical kinetics of Corrosion
4. Passivity
5. Polarization methods to measure corrosion rate
6. Galvanic and concentration cell corrosion
7. Pitting and crevice corrosion
8. Environmentally induced cracking
9. Effects of metallurgical structure on corrosion
10. Corrosion-related damage by hydrogen, erosion and wear
11. Corrosion in selected corrosive environments
12. Atmospheric corrosion and elevated temperature corrosion
13. Cathodic protection
14. Coating and inhibitors
15. Materials selection and design

gradMethod.ch:
1. 期中筆試  30％
2. 書面報告  15％
3. 口頭報告 (依據書面報告為主軸，20分鐘報告)  40％ (口頭20％, ppt 10％同學評分10％)
4. 出席  15％
gradMethod.en:
1. Midterm examination  30％
2. Written report  20％
3. Oral presentation (on basis of the report,    totally 20 min)
 40％ (oral 20％, ppt 10％, Peer Evaluation 10％)
4. Attendance  10％
